title: Denny's Shipwreck Adventure
story_setup: Denny the baby crab found an old shipwreck to explore! His friend Finn the clownfish is waiting by a treasure chest to show Denny all the wonderful things they can discover together.
instruction: Draw a line to help Denny reach Finn at the treasure chest.
tts_instruction: Can you help Denny find his way through the shipwreck to reach his friend Finn? Draw a gentle line with your finger to guide Denny safely to where Finn is waiting by the treasure chest.

character_start.description: Bright orange-red baby crab, curious and cheerful, small claws, big expressive eyes
character_start.name: Denny

character_end.description: Orange clownfish with white stripes, brave and adventurous
character_end.name: Finn

educational_question: What do you think Denny and Finn might find inside the old treasure chest on the shipwreck?
fun_fact: Baby crabs like Denny grow bigger by shedding their hard shell and growing a new, larger one underneath.
completion_message: Great job helping Denny reach Finn at the shipwreck - now they can explore the treasure chest together!
